# init(createPublisher:)

**Initializer**

Creates a deferred publisher.

## Declaration

```swift
init(createPublisher: @escaping () -> DeferredPublisher)
```

## Parameters

- **createPublisher**: The closure to execute when calling `subscribe(_:)`.
title: init(createPublisher:)
